about.me: Welcome to FAIR Pool #01 Cardano Staking Pool. Staking since the first shelley epoch. This is a cardano staking pool based in europe with focus on strengthening and decentralizing the cardano network. We offer highly available, secure staking based on automated and scalable nodes driven by a modern server environment. We deeply believe in decentralization and giving back the power to each individual. The margin is set to 0.5% and we offer the lowest possible fixed fee of 340 ADA and this will never change for the lifetime of this pool.

about.server: Encourage decentralization by delegating to the reliable and hard working Hedges Stake Pool

about.me: The EnigmA stake pool is operational since epoch 222. We are an independent stake pool operator and support SPOs who are running single pools. We will never start the 2nd pool as we believe in the decentralization of the network. Our mission is to Decentralizing the Cardano network, Donate to Cancer research hospitals and give back to our delegators. We thank you for your love and support. Let’s mint some ADA together!
about.mission: Our mission is to help the Cardano network to become more secure and decentralize. Securing the Cardano network is important, but it is also important that we take care of our local community and our delegators. We Donate 5% of our reward to Cancer research hospitals and another 5% ADA as an extra bonus on top of regular staking rewards for our delegators.

about.server: World's southernmost Cardano Stake Pool running on bare metal servers. Running on 100% renewable energy. Located in Invercargill, New Zealand

about.me: Cardano's Blockhouse welcomes you at our stake pool. We build Cardano's blocks! One experienced system administrator manages our stake pool 24/7 so that you can rely on best block rewards at all times. We're glad to serve you.
about.server: To achieve best redundancy and geographical distribution a mix of virtual and physical bare-metal machines is used. Each of our relay- and block-nodes is equipped with at least 4 dedicated cores, 32 GByte ECC RAM and reliable storage. Ressources are easily scalable and get adjusted whenever required.

about.me: The ADA for Warriors (4WARD) pool is a mission-driven single pool operated by a small business located in the US. The pool was created as a way to give back to those who have quietly served by donating 30% of the operator's rewards to the Third Option Foundation. We also donate 10% to Captive Audience and 10% to 500 Rising. Donations for each mission can be tracked on their respective pages on our pool website.
about.server: Servers consist of two relays and one block producer deployed in AWS.  Each instance has 4 CPUs and 16 GB RAM (exceeds current hardware requirements).  One relay and the block producer are in the AWS US East Region and the other relay is in the AWS European Central Region.  Security and recovery best practices have been implemented to help ensure availability.

about.company: We are an Australian Cardano Stake Pool, committed to security, decentralisation and always running one pool only. Our fees are 1% now and going forward, and our focus for community outreach is centred on local recycling and clean transport projects.

about.me: IT pro with over 20 years experience in Systems and Network Administration, security and VoIP. Our stake holders can rest assured we will make every effort to stay competitive and reliable. Pool up since epoch 208 (first in the Shelley era) with 99.9% uptime transparently shown in our website. Member of the SPOCRA alliance and active participant in the Cardano community. -- https://www.linkedin.com/in/avilsmeier/ -- Nuestro pool es parte del grupo de Cardano Hispano (https://www.youtube.com/CardanoHispano), que busca ofrecer información clara y útil a operadores y delegadores de la comunidad hispana en general.

about.me: Hi, my name is Mark and I'm the pool operator of HUG. I have over 10 years’ experience working in the IT industry, my main skills are system admin and network engineering. Currently, I'm a network engineer working for one of the largest NHS trusts in the UK, which has over 25k devices connected to the network. I am also an under 10s football coach qualified to FA Level 1 :-)
